name: Susanoomon
effect: You may digivolve this card from your hand onto one of your Tamers as if the Tamer is a level 6 Digimon by placing 10 Tamer cards and/or cards with [Hybrid] in their traits from your hand and/or trash at the bottom of your deck in any order.  ＜Security Attack +2＞ (This Digimon checks 2 additional security cards.)[When Digivolving] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
